TextLibrary.Text: Ahh... Maethelburg. Take a long look around, boy. The next time you see it, this city will be home to only the undead.
Ahh... Maethelburg. Take a long look around, boy. The next time you see it, this city will be home to only the undead.
Ahh... Maethelburg. Take a long look around, girl. The next time you see it, this city will be home to only the undead.
Ahh... Maethelburg. Take a long look around, girl. The next time you see it, this city will be home to only the undead.
The name is Moarg. LORD Moarg. You need to learn some respect, boy!
The name is Moarg. LORD Moarg. You need to learn some respect, boy!
The name is Moarg. LORD Moarg. You need to learn some respect, girl!
The name is Moarg. LORD Moarg. You need to learn some respect, girl!
It's you who needs a lesson in respect. Now, be quiet. There'll be plenty of time for you to talk when we reach the Red Tower.
